content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Mr. Wang, I'm glad you found the apartment to your liking. Let's negotiate the rent. I'm sure we can find a fair price that meets both our needs.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Wang, I propose a rent of 1000 Euros a month for this beautiful apartment. It's in the city center, close to all important facilities. It's a great deal.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Mr. Wang, I appreciate your offer, but I believe the apartment is worth more. Why don't we say 1500 euros per month? It's a prestigious location, and I'm sure you'll find it a comfortable place to live.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I think the initial offer of 1000 Euros is already fair considering the location and facilities.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I understand your point of view, Mr. Wang. However, I must reject your offer and end this negotiation. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
